summary: New Animation changes in third person for sprint with ready spell and dodge
descriptionHtml:
New animation for sprint with spell readied and dodge

[youtube]Uc_90TWhq1Y[/youtube]

installation: copy the files to your Skyrim folder
Skyrim/Data/meshes/actors/character/animations/

Uninstallation 
Delete these files from /animations folder:
mag_runbackward.hkx
mag_runleft.hkx
mag_runright.hkx
magcast_runbackward.hkx
magcast_runleft.hkx
magcast_runright.hkx
magic_sprintforward.hkx

WARNING this mod still have a glitch: arrow position look misplaced sometimes, so this required mods below make arrow sheathe/scabbard disappear everytime you switch weapon or switch spells.

REQUIRES:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10753]Auto Unequip Ammo by Alek[/url]

another mod
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30666]Dual Wield New Animation[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33249]Hold Your Torch Higher[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33412]Parkour Dovahkiin[/url]

feedback and endorse if you like

Thanks to Bethesda and Nexus
author: robiehn
